name: AS_1_2_Manage_Provider_s_Location_Within_Facility
title: AS.1.2 Manage Provider's Location Within Facility (Function)
description: Provide provider location or contact information on a facility's premises.
purpose: The identification of provider's location within a facility may facilitate the handling of critical care situations. This may include the location of on site practitioners by name or immediate required specialty. A real-time tracking system may provide automatic update of such information.

statement.label: AS.1.2#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to manage information on a provider's location, and/or contact information when the provider is on a facility's premises.

statement.label: AS.1.2#02
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to manage a provider's scheduled visits to a given facility.
